body:
Aunukia@yahoo.com on forum suggested:

Adding/removing cards from a deck is very labor-intensive and time consuming. I suggest a way (if one already exists, please let me know) to simply click on the card and add or subtract cards by key press - perhaps - / = (+) or delete / enter or something
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: add/remove cards from deck using keyboard shortcut
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on December 30, 2012 08:48:54_

Aunukia@yahoo.com on forum suggested:

Adding/removing cards from a deck is very labor-intensive and time consuming. I suggest a way (if one already exists, please let me know) to simply click on the card and add or subtract cards by key press - perhaps - / = (+) or delete / enter or something
